definition: To complete a task or achieve a goal, often involving effort, perseverance, and overcoming challenges. It is commonly used to describe the act of accomplishing something, whether it be a physical or mental task, or the successful completion of a project or objective.

examples.german: Er schafft seine Arbeit nicht rechtzeitig.
examples.english: He doesn't finish his work on time.
We have to complete the project.

examples.german: Sie schafft es, pünktlich zu sein.
examples.english: She manages to be on time.
